summary: Frontend testing of Report Template Designer - Undo/Copy/Paste functionality. All 8 requested features verified: Undo button exists and enables after changes, Copy/Paste buttons work correctly, Ctrl+C/Ctrl+V/Ctrl+Z keyboard shortcuts work, template loads cleanly without duplicates, undo history clears on fresh load.
passed_tests: ✅ Undo button exists in toolbar with Undo icon (data-testid='undo-btn')
✅ Undo button is disabled when no history (fresh load)
✅ Undo button becomes enabled after making changes (add element)
✅ Undo button click restores previous state and shows 'Undo successful' toast
✅ Copy button exists in toolbar with Copy icon (data-testid='copy-btn')
✅ Copy button is disabled when no element selected
✅ Copy button becomes enabled when element is selected
✅ Copy button click copies element to clipboard and shows 'Element copied' toast
✅ Paste button exists in toolbar with Clipboard icon (data-testid='paste-btn')
✅ Paste button is disabled when clipboard is empty
✅ Paste button becomes enabled after copying an element
✅ Paste button click pastes element with 30px offset and shows 'Element pasted' toast
✅ Ctrl+C keyboard shortcut copies selected element
✅ Ctrl+V keyboard shortcut pastes from clipboard
✅ Ctrl+Z keyboard shortcut undoes last action
✅ Template loads cleanly without duplicate/stale elements from previous sessions
✅ Undo history clears on fresh template load
✅ Clipboard clears on fresh template load
✅ Workflow: Add element -> Undo -> Element is removed (verified)
✅ Keyboard shortcuts help text displayed in right panel
context_for_next_testing_agent: Report Template Designer Undo/Copy/Paste features fully tested. Key implementation details: 1) undoHistory state stores JSON stringified element states (max 50 entries), 2) isUndoingRef prevents recording undo during undo operation, 3) clipboard state stores JSON stringified element, 4) Paste creates new element with 30px offset, 5) Template load clears both undoHistory and clipboard for clean state, 6) Keyboard shortcuts: Ctrl+C (copy), Ctrl+V (paste), Ctrl+Z (undo), Ctrl+D (duplicate), Delete (remove), 7) All buttons have proper data-testid attributes for testing.

copy_button.action: Copies selected element to clipboard state
